sections.heading: 02|Animals running at large on public roads - grazing on another's land
sections.text: Effective:March 28, 2017Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 235 - 131st General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFNo person, who is the owner or keeper of horses, mules, cattle, bison, sheep, goats, swine, llamas, alpacas, or po
